extDescription.message: Bookmark, navigate, and organize your GPT conversations. Sort, edit, and export with clarity and structure.

introText.message: Bookmark, navigate, and organize your GPT conversations. Sort, edit, and export with clarity and structure.

clickToJump.message: Click bookmark to jump to original

doubleClickToEdit.message: Double click to edit bookmark name

feedbackLink.description: Label for feedback link in popup

donateLink.description: Label for donate link in popup

presetStructuredHead.message: I collected many materials. Please help me organize the hierarchy and key points, and output a clear structured summary:

presetStructuredTail.message: Use layered lists or small headings; keep it concise and accurate.

presetCreativeHead.message: I picked some ideas. Please infer my preferences and expand more directions:

presetCreativeTail.message: Group by themes, propose more extensible new ideas, and explain the potential value of each direction.

bakeIntro.message: We will add your prompts before and after the selected content. You can copy it to GPT to help organize or brainstorm.

copySuccess.message: Content copied to clipboard. You can paste it directly into the GPT chat.

copyFailed.message: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please try again.

customPromptPrefix.message:
This is my summary of our chat,
please help me

exportTip.message: After selecting an export method, the content will be automatically copied to your clipboard. You can paste it directly into the GPT chat window.

hoverTip.message: Tip: Hover over options to see detailed descriptions

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete $COUNT$ selected bookmarks?

exportRawTooltip.message: Export selected content directly without any prompts

exportQuotesTooltip.message: Organize into a concise list of quotes, one sentence per item, without additional analysis. Perfect for collecting key points and conclusions.

exportStructuredTooltip.message: Organize into a structured document with chapters and key points. Ideal for writing proposals, documents, or notes.

exportCreativeTooltip.message: Categorize and expand ideas. Provide more creative suggestions, examples, and recommendations for each category to help brainstorming.

customPromptTooltip.message: Use a custom prompt to have GPT process the content according to your specific requirements

bookmarkElementCreateFailed.message: Failed to create bookmark element: missing required DOM elements

bookmarkListContainerNotFound.message: Bookmark list container not found, recreating UI

deleteGroupConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

deleteBookmarkConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?

exportRawPrompt.message: Here are some important excerpts from our conversation:

exportQuotesPrompt.message: Here are some key quotes from our conversation. Please help me organize them into a concise list, one sentence per item, without additional analysis:

exportStructuredPrompt.message: Here are some important excerpts from our conversation. Please help me organize them into a structured document with chapters and key points:

exportCreativePrompt.message: Here are some important excerpts from our conversation. Please help me reorganize them creatively, adding your insights and extended thoughts:

addTitlePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the bookmark title input field.

untitled.description: Default title for a bookmark without a title.
